SEARCH
Module com.example.studiomanagergui
Package com.example.studiomanagergui

Class Date

java.lang.Object
com.example.studiomanagergui.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
The Date class represents a date in the calendar. It provides methods to check the validity of a date and includes leap year calculations. Implements the Comparable interface for date comparisons.
Author:
Priyansh Parikh, Siddarth Seloth

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks if the date is a valid calendar date.
      Returns:

    • checkToday_Or_Future

      public boolean checkToday_Or_Future()
      Checks if the date is a future date or today.
      Returns:
      true if the date is today or future date, false otherwise.

    • isLeapYear

      public static boolean isLeapYear(int year)
      Checks if a year is a leap year.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the year is a leap year, false otherwise.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date other)
      Compares this date to another date.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      other - The date to compare to.
      Returns:
      A negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this date is before, equal to, or after the specified date.

    • checkProperAge

      public boolean checkProperAge()
      Checks if someone is 18 years old older based on their birthday.
